EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Website_Techweek_LA_Followup_Q116.Techweek LA post event email - 3/3/16
EmailTemplate.subject: Great seeing you at Techweek LA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We enjoyed the traveling celebration of innovation, creativity, risks, rewards, parties, and other cool things that make up Techweek; and hope you did, too. Thanks for attending talks given by our Pivotal presenters.
In case you missed anything or wanted to share our sessions with your colleagues, here’s a quick recap:
- Watch the session <[[http://pivotal.io/event/latechweek]]> The Real Meaning of Digital Transformation for Businesses Today presented by Teresa Leighty, Director of Transformation, Pivotal. - Check out the panel discussion <[[http://pivotal.io/event/latechweek]]> with Katy Lynch, CEO of Tech Week, Abby Kearns of Pivotal, Jane Margolis of UCLA, and Colleen Lewis of Harvey Mudd College that followed the special screening of the documentary CODE: Debugging the Gender Gap <[[http://www.codedocumentary.com/]]>. - Listen to the audio recording <[[http://pivotal.io/event/latechweek]]> of Making Design Matter with Tim McCoy, Sr. Director of Product Design & User Experience, Pivotal. - Hear Janice Fraser <[[http://pivotal.io/event/latechweek]]>, Director of People, Pivotal, give her presentation Leading into the Future: The Lean Startup Mindset.
Enjoy our Talks? Sign up to receive email updates <[[http://pivotal.io/event/latechweek]]> on programs happening in your area or follow us on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/pivotallabs]]> to get updates on upcoming talks and events.
Want more?
- Learn how our customers work with Pivotal <[[http://pivotal.io/customers#labs]]> to transform the way they build and release products, drive decisions and interact with customers. - Apply for a Pivotal Labs Product Office Hours <[[http://pivotal.io/office-hours]]> session to workshop a specific product or design challenge and walk away with actionable advice—all completely free of charge and confidential! - Explore the Pivotal Podcast Series <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]>, which includes interviews and discussions about how organizations can be more open, agile and cloud-ready.
Let’s keep the conversation going!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
